newsitem.title: USA: Williams unit expands NEC distribution deal.
newsitem.headline: Williams unit expands NEC distribution deal.

text.p: Williams Communications Group on Friday said its Williams Telecommunications Systems Inc (WilTel) unit signed an expanded distribution deal with NEC America Inc.
The three-year, $50 million deal expands WilTel's previous agreement to distribute voice-only NEC products. Now Williams will distribute data and video products as well.
NEC America is an affiliate of NEC Corp.
WilTel provides equipment and integration services for data, voice and video. Its parent, Williams Communications is part of the Williams Cos Inc.
Williams Cos shares were down 1-3/4 to 45 at midday Friday.
